rules.description: Fn + backspace sends Option + backspace (delete word)
Option + Shift + Q sends Command + Q (close app)
Rebind Chrome shortcuts to be more Windows like
Override Left Control + [TAB,|] = Right Control + [TAB,|] in Chrome
Left Control + key sends Command + key for Chrome shortcuts
Option + shift + q sends CMD + q
Change home / end to CTRL buttons
